asdaa

Hi there ! How are you ? Yep, i hope you are well, so, let's talk.
Imagine, that you can design, create, your own platform, your own busines model for everething wihch you want, imposible ? No! thats real.
Well i guess you won't be reading a ton of not necessary literary garbage and I don't want to take a lot of your time.

1. First that's i want to look thru will be Routing

Routing is most necessary part of MVS, i guess it's headspring. I'm using XML and SQL parts which were designed for current engine.

First step is URL Request. User is going to connect to web site, our Routing system is taking that url request. System look into XML urls file and trying to find same pattern which would equals to our request. If we will find congruence with our list then, rout is and we can load our Controller.
Controller will take all information about url data and should load specific model class in our system. Controller realizes the relationship between Model and View.
Model is our basic core for page logic. It's separately thing out of all system and others models.We can realize our logic within current model and it will be totally encapsulated !
It's all for the first time, i hope you won't be angry about my English. Se you later ;)
